function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Standard-62.1 and Standard-90.1 focus on thermal comfort, ventilation, and energy efficiency without considering pandemics, potentially leading to inadequate measures for controlling contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease transmission in built environments due to the lack of proactive pandemic-related design and operation guidelines.","Mitigation":"Integration of pandemic-specific design guidelines and operation protocols into existing standards and regulations to address contagious disease transmission in built environments.","Technologies":"Integration of advanced ventilation systems, air filtration technology, and UVGI-ultraviolet germicidal irradiation for infection control in built environments.","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, facility managers, and policymakers.","Owner":"ASHRAE, REHVA, SHASE, Architectural Society of China, Chinese Institute of Refrigeration, governmental health and safety agencies."}]}
